qas.question: How large of a drop in sales did IBM report for fiscal year 2013?
What date did IBM announce that its executives would forgo bonuses for fiscal year 2013?
IBM committed to an expansion totaling this dollar amount in 2014?
How many new data centers did IBM commit to building?
Who is the chief executive of IBM?
What did CE Virginia Rometty want to do with IBM's cloud storage business in 2014?
How much profit did the cloud storage business net in 2012?
What benefit was Rometty the only one willing to forego in 2012?
What is one type of storage that has been more popular with youger generations?
How many times did IBM have to reinvent itself in the past?

context: On <a1_0>January 21, 2014<a1_0/> IBM announced that company executives would forgo <b7_0>bonuses<b7_0/> for fiscal year 2013. The move came as the firm reported a <a0_0>5% drop<a0_0/> in sales and 1% decline in net profit over 2012. It also committed to a <a2_0><b6_0>$1.2bn<b6_0/><a2_0/> plus expansion of its data center and <b8_0>cloud-storage<b8_0/> business, including the development of <a3_0>15<a3_0/> new data centers. After <b9_0>ten<b9_0/> successive quarters of flat or sliding sales under Chief Executive <a4_0>Virginia Rometty<a4_0/> IBM is being forced to look at new approaches. Said Rometty, “We’ve got to <b5_0>reinvent<b5_0/> ourselves like we’ve done in prior generations.”
